t:
The hungry family was very happy to see the pizza guy arrive.


As he searched the empty house, they shut the door behind him,
their mouth salivating at the sight
                                         of his body.
c:
He'll make some great toppings for their pizza; and it'll be free.



#pizza #homedelivery #cannibalism #hungry #family #death
